name: Bullet Hell (MisoNaisa)
description:
CONTROLS 

-Use WASD keys to move
-Use Spacebar to shoot
-Use C to use your Ultimate attack
-Hold left shift to enable focus mode
-Press P or ESCAPE to pause in a level

CHEATS:
Use our unique cheat system featuring konami codes to cheat your way through our game 
Step 1: Press ENTER 3 times (this enables cheat mode)
Step 2: Enter your favorite cheat code:

 Note: These keys are used to enter cheats

UP_ARROW (U)

DOWN_ARROW (D)

LEFT_ARROW (L)

RIGHT_ARROW (R)

A
B
Cheat codes:
UDLRRLABAB – Infinite HP 
UUDDLRLRAB – Skip to boss 1
DDUURLRLBA – Skip to boss 2
AAAAAAAAAA – Skip to boss 3
